summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to proceed with re-construction of the Carkeek Park Environmental Education Center Annex and construction of related Carkeek Park elements; appropriating funds from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund therefor; and approving acceptance of funds to reimburse the Cumulative Reserve Subfund for the project; all by a three fourths vote of the City Council.
